long_desc.thetext:
In contribution "qxe" go to the ButtonPane and do:
grunt validate-config
the following error occurs:
>> >>> Warning: Errors found in /home/sand/files/dev/javascript/per/qxe/trunk/demo/ButtonPane/conf2208597193.tmp.json: >> - Warning: Additional properties are not allowed ('bypass-export-list' was unexpected) in '/include/0'.
Looking at the log of:
./generate.py validate-config
then it is a normal output without errors.
--------------- [sand@localhost ButtonPane]$ grunt validate-config Running "validate-config" task
Running "generate:validate-config" (generate) task Running: 'python generate.py validate-config -c conf2208597193.tmp.json ' ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- Initializing: ButtonPane ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- >>> Processing configuration
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- Executing: validate-config ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- >>> /home/sand/files/dev/javascript/qooxdoo/tool/data/config/base.json successfully validated. >>> /home/sand/files/dev/javascript/qooxdoo/component/apiviewer/api.json successfully validated. >>> /home/sand/files/dev/javascript/qooxdoo/tool/data/config/base.json successfully validated. >>> /home/sand/files/dev/javascript/qooxdoo/component/testrunner/basic.json successfully validated. >>> /home/sand/files/dev/javascript/qooxdoo/component/testrunner/testrunner.json successfully validated. >>> /home/sand/files/dev/javascript/qooxdoo/component/inspector/inspector.json successfully validated. >>> /home/sand/files/dev/javascript/qooxdoo/component/simulator/simulator.json successfully validated. >>> /home/sand/files/dev/javascript/qooxdoo/tool/data/config/application.json successfully validated. >>> /home/sand/files/dev/javascript/per/qxe/trunk/demo/ButtonPane/config.json successfully validated. >> >>> Warning: Errors found in /home/sand/files/dev/javascript/per/qxe/trunk/demo/ButtonPane/conf2208597193.tmp.json: >> - Warning: Additional properties are not allowed ('bypass-export-list' was unexpected) in '/include/0'. >>> Done (0m00.88)
Done, without errors.
Move open issues to RESOLVED â€“ LATER, whose last comment is older than a year.
